content: let me show you how to take a big pile of ugly or old scrap yarn and make this nice big tote bag/basket this is a great beginner crochet tutorial i have over 20 pictures in this 10-page pdf and give step by step details on how to make this scrap yarn tote bag/basket us crochet terms my example measures approximately 20x27 but i give info on how to make this smaller you can also use this pattern to make this larger by using larger hook/yarn you can use any colors and make fun unique tote bags/baskets to use as home decor or give as gifts materials any type of yarn can be used for this project my example uses #4 size yarn in assorted brands i give a lot of details in my pattern on how to choose the proper yarn and hooks to make this project there is no yardage listed for this pattern as it is a scrap yarn project and i have pulled dozens of ugly skeins and partially used skeins to make this tote basket you will also find a pattern for a set of round nesting baskets that was made in conjunction with this oval basket i am here all to help and support you in any way i can after you download my pattern i would love to see your scrappy yarn totes made from this pattern so please tag me on ig @theburgundybasket due to the nature of pdf and it being an instant download i cant refund your fee -which i ve kept low - but am here to assist if you need please let me know if you find any errors or have any trouble
